text: Þis sant ða landimare at þortune, þe ierð in to Hamtune, arest on arcetham.
Of archethamme on Rumanhelle, þanen of breþling made<../images/tbar.gif>on wigerðes stapel, þanen to tudesleghe of þere lege be kinges imare on blinnesfeld.
Þanen be wde on þere hinc imare anlang mares<../images/tbar.gif>on ealdmannes wyerðe þanan on þa seales, of þan sealen þat eft on arcetham.
And þis sent þe tweire hide landimare þe cyna achte þe ealde.
Arest on iwern broc, of þane broke on þe lang dich, þan on þene weie, anlang weies to late mere.
Þane onlang sledes on ða smale þornes, þanne on ða dich, þanne swo be diche on cranemere, of cranemere eft on iwern broc.
